item.description:
As women and especially women in business we know how to be flexible and creative.  Your leadership team is pleased with the quality of speakers and attendance levels we have had so far this year.  So, when the March program did not come together as expected we decided to leave the time open for networking and a discussion of programs you would like to see to round out this year in AWBL and to jump start program planning for 2011-2012.

 

Here are a few topic ideas to get your creative juices flowing:

  • Social networking as a business tool
  • The sandwich generation--how to thrive with aging parents
  • Using your intuition in a business setting

 

So come with your business cards and your ideas.  See you there!
item.why: We have great momentum going and the leadership team wants to finish the year with the same great enthusiasm as we started with.
item.name: Network and Plan
